trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref> expression, an expression that returns a <xref:System.Type> for a specified type name.
A CodeTypeOfExpression represents a `typeof` expression that returns a <xref:System.Type> at runtime.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeOfExpression.Type%2A> property specifies the data type to return a <xref:System.Type> object for.

Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceExpression> to represent source code that refers to a type by name, such as when creating a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCastExpression> to cast an object to a name-specified type.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeOfExpression"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeOfExpression"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref> expression.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeOfExpression"></xref> class using the specified type.
The name of the data type for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref> expression.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeOfExpression"></xref> class using the specified type.
The data type of the data type of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref> expression.
Gets or sets the data type referenced by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref> expression.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type referenced by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref> expression.
This property will never return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, and defaults to the <xref:System.Void> type.
